items.title: High School Graduation
items.subtitle: Mount Vernon High School
items.description: On this date, I graduated from Mount Vernon High School in Mount Vernon, Virginia. I finished with a GPA of 3.55 and an Advanced Diploma.

items.title: Faculty Support Worker
items.subtitle: Christopher Newport University
items.description: Began working as a student employee, helping students and faculty with hardware, software, and network issues. Helped with issues in classrooms, residence halls, and other buildings on campus.

items.title: The Guidance Team
items.subtitle: RGB Schemes LLC
items.description: Released my first game under my LLC, The Guidance Team, for Oculus Go and GearVR devices. Developed in Unity, I had to ensure the game met strict performance requirements on mobile hardware.

items.title: Software Developer Intern
items.subtitle: Perfect Commerce
items.description: Began working as a Softare Developer Intern at Perfect Commerce (now called proactis). Helped to develop automated test cases in Selenium with Java. Also helped debug, fix, and enhance current and legacy code using ASP.NET in C# and JavaScript.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.subtitle: CW Optics
items.description: Helped to develop the software for usage of the WoundImager device. Implemented various algorithms created by the company, including one which was used to calculate the velocity of blood through wounds on images gathered from the device.

items.title: Research and Development Intern
items.subtitle: Swisslog
items.description: Researched new technologies to use for warehouse management, including hardware, software, usability, ease-of-access, safety, and more. Specifically developed rapid prototypes on hardware such as Google Glass and demonstrated to various executives both at Swisslog and outside of the company.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.subtitle: Swisslog
items.description: Switched from an intern to a full time Software Engineer at Swisslog. Worked on a variety of projects, including continuing R&D work, helping to improve documentation for certain products (reducing setup time by as much 60%), and mainted a 100% deployment success rate with no rollbacks being required for my changes on products.

items.title: Software Development Engineer I
items.subtitle: Amazon
items.description: Working on the Alexa on Tablets to help bring Alexa to Amazon's Fire Tablets. I do a combination of Android development, server-side work, and Android source development.

items.title: Software Development Engineer II
items.subtitle: Amazon
items.description: Promoted to Software Development Engineer II at Amazon.

items.title: Software Development Engineer II
items.subtitle: Amazon
items.description: Moved teams internally at Amazon to the Alexa Skills Kit (ASK). I am working with machine learning teams and more to help further develop and improve the developer experience of building skills for Alexa.

items.title: Founder
items.subtitle: RGB Schemes LLC
items.description: Setup an LLC for which to distribute video games I make in my spare time under, as well as learn how to setup an LLC and manage it.

items.title: Computer Science Capstone
items.subtitle: Christopher Newport University
items.description: Completed and presented my computer science capstone project for the completion of my computer science degree. This project was called Project Virtua and was a project to create a library for using the Microsoft Kinect 1.0 and an Oculus DK1.

items.title: Computer Engineering Capstone
items.subtitle: Christopher Newport University
items.description: Completed and presented my computer engineering capstone project for the completion of my computer science degree. This project made use of a Microsoft Kinect 2.0 sensor to track how the device moved, attempting to track the position of the device in realtime .

items.title: University Graduation
items.subtitle: Christopher Newport University
items.description: On this date, I completed my undergraduate degrees in Computer Engineering and Computer Science at Christopher Newport University.

items.title: Began Undergraduate Degrees
items.subtitle: Christopher Newport University
items.description: On this date, I began my undergraduate degrees in Computer Engineering and Computer Science at Christopher Newport University.
